page.title: 05INDUSTRY & EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Almost the entire industry in this block is associated with farming, although apart from their owner/ occupying family members, only a few jobs are now provided by these farms for the local population. Each of the three hamlets has a high proportion of retired people, but fortunately almost all the houses are occupied all the year round and have so far escaped the scourge of the 'holiday home fraternity'. There are a few small family businesses which include a market garden; two kennels/ catteries ( one with livery stables ) but these only provide employment for their owners. The other residents commute to the towns in the area which include Barnard Castle and Darlington. The population is small, scattered and largely middle-aged but there is little or no unemployment.
